p: This analysis shows that the impact of disruptions to HIV services during the COVID-19 pandemic could be limited, if countries are able to maintain key services, but under worst-case assumptions could also be comparable with the range of deaths projected to be caused by COVID-19. Ultimately, ensuring the ART supply for individuals currently on treatment would minimise excess mortality among PLHIV in sub-Saharan Africa and should be a key priority for policymakers.
